title: Body typeface in Crossway Book
content:
This should be easy, but my brain is fried; and I can’t get back to working well until I know what this is:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008105513im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture2_6548.png)

You can see all the characters in [this PDF](http://web.archive.org/books.com/pdf_files/9781433501296.pdf) of the first chapter.

 [‹ UNDEROATH](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008105513/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49061 "Go to previous forum topic") [Baseball Tonight font -- ESPN -- extra pics added! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008105513/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49760 "Go to next forum topic")
author: liikennevalo

comments.content: Brilliant! Thank you, I can rest now.
